entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
